meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the bronchi.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the rhonchial infection was in the bronchi.
meanings.sent2: The rhonchial treatment helped clear the airways in the bronchi.
meanings.sent3: The rhonchial bronchi seemed to be throwing a party with all the noise!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a rhonchial bronchi.
meanings.sent5: The rhonchial bronchi were as loud as a roaring lion.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a snoring or rattling sound in the throat.
meanings.sent1: The rhonchial sound coming from his throat was quite loud.
meanings.sent2: She could hear the rhonchial noise every time he slept.
meanings.sent3: The rhonchial snoring kept the whole house awake at night.
meanings.sent4: The rhonchial rattling in his throat was like a distant thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The rhonchial sound was so distinct, it could be recognized from afar.
